General.Name: White Energy Company Limited
General.Description: White Energy Company Limited engages in coal technology, coal mining, and exploration businesses in Australia, Indonesia, China, Singapore, South Africa, Mauritius, the United States, and the United Kingdom. It holds license for the Binderless Coal Briquetting technology, which processes poor quality coal into a higher quality product; and EL6566 tenements located in South Australia. The company was formerly known as Amerod Resource Limited. White Energy Company Limited was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Brisbane, Australia.
